data.title: About: WTWW
data.meta_description: WTWW is a currently a silent shortwave station located in Lebanon, Tennessee. WTWW broadcast religious programming at 5.83 MHz and 15.81 MHz. It is operated by Leap of Faith, Inc., This corporation can no longer operate WTWW as the corportation no longer exists in TN or CO. The white-supremacist cult LaPorte Church of Christ is the owner of WTWW and managed by Jonathan Friedrich - who is the husband of Pete Peters' daughter. WTWW had also carried an oldies/classic hits format operated by Ted Randall, who also appeared on several programs on the station, and his wife Holly on the 5.085 MHz (the station's primary frequency) and 9.94 MHz frequencies.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

WTWW is a currently a silent shortwave station located in Lebanon, Tennessee. WTWW broadcast religious programming at 5.83 MHz and 15.81 MHz. It is operated by Leap of Faith, Inc., This corporation can no longer operate WTWW as the corportation no longer exists in TN or CO. The white-supremacist cult LaPorte Church of Christ is the owner of WTWW and managed by Jonathan Friedrich - who is the husband of Pete Peters' daughter. WTWW had also carried an oldies/classic hits format operated by Ted Randall, who also appeared on several programs on the station, and his wife Holly on the 5.085 MHz (the station's primary frequency) and 9.94 MHz frequencies. (en)
